english.segment1: Cut out a heart and then ran away with you. Today I'll start and do the same to you. I'll watch you leave. I'm not what you need.
english.segment2: Everyone wants the same as I do. As you wait and bleed, I am trying to forget you.
english.segment3: I'll watch you leave. I'm not what you need.
english.segment4: Lie to me to make this better, and I won't leave. I will stay. I've made a grave with you. We can sleep now. Entombed, we can sleep now.
english.segment5: So this happens once again to a child without sin. Don't say, "This is love.". Just say, " This is greed". We'll watch you leave.
english.segment6: We won't give up this time. We won't give up. We'll give our all this time. We'll give our all
